explanation: Agent A is correct. The macro _MHD_EXTERN expands to __attribute__((visibility("default")))extern which uses the GCC/Clang __attribute__((...)) syntax — a compiler-specific, non‑standard extension (documented as an extension in GCC/Clang docs). MISRA C 2023 Rule 1.2 prohibits use of language/compiler extensions unless accounted for per project deviations, so this use constitutes a Rule 1.2 violation. (A compliant alternative is to guard the attribute with compiler-detection macros or provide a portable empty definition when the compiler does not support the attribute.)
